General.Name: ALTRAD plettac assco GmbH
General.Description: ALTRAD plettac assco GmbH manufactures scaffolding products for the construction industry in Germany and internationally. Its products comprise frame scaffoldings, modular scaffoldings, mobile scaffoldings, staging/grandstands, and weather protection roofing products, as well as various accessories, including base plates, fall arrests, pedestrian protection products, lattice girders, bridges, staircases, couplers, ties, lifts, and winches. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Plettenberg, Germany. ALTRAD plettac assco GmbH is a subsidiary of Altrad Investment Authority S.A.S.
